stimulusHtml: Which of the following explains why the amount predicted by the value of the simple money multiplier may be overstated?
choicesHtml: It does not take into account the amount of bank loans.
It does not take into account the marginal propensity to consume.
It does not take into account a bankâ€™s desire to hold excess reserves.
It does not take into account changes in expected inflation.
It does not take into account changes in savings.
